description: Published 'Interpretable machine learning uncovers epithelial transcriptional rewiring and a role for Gelsolin in COPD' in 'The Journal of Clinical Investigation Insight'
Contributed to 'Spatial microniches of IL-2 combine with IL-10 to drive lung migratory TH2 cells in response to inhaled allergen' in 'Nature Immunology'

Contributed to 'High-dimensional profiling of immune responses to kidney transplant reveals heterogeneous T helper 1 and B cell effectors associated with rejection' in 'American Journal of Transplantation'

Contributed to 'Tim-3 Is Required for Regulatory T Cellâ€“Mediated Promotion of T Cell Exhaustion and Viral Persistence during Chronic Lymphocytic Choriomeningitis Virus Infection' in 'Journal of Immunology'
Published 'Deep humoral profiling coupled to interpretable machine learning unveils diagnostic markers and pathophysiology of schistosomiasis' in 'Science Translational Medicine'
Contributed to 'Regulatory T Cell Insufficiency in Autoimmune Diabetes Is Driven by Selective Loss of Neuropilin-1 on Intraislet Regulatory T Cells' in 'Journal of Immunology'
Contributed to 'Aberrant mitochondrial DNA synthesis in macrophages exacerbates inflammation and atherosclerosis' in 'Nature Communications'
Contributed to 'The RNA binding protein Arid5a drives IL-17-dependent autoantibody-induced glomerulonephritis' in 'Journal of Experimental Medicine'
Contributed to 'Mapping the Evolutionary Space of SARS-CoV-2 Variants to Anticipate Emergence of Subvariants Resistant to COVID-19 Therapeutics' in 'PLoS Computational Biology'

Contributed to 'Transcriptomic and Proteomic Characterization of the Immune Response to Elective Spinal Reconstructive Surgery: Impact of Aging and Comparison with Traumatic Injury Response' in 'Journal of the American College of Surgeons'
Contributed to 'Temporal dynamics and genomic programming of plasma cell fates' in 'Nature Immunology'
Published 'Population-level comparisons of gene regulatory networks modeled on high-throughput single-cell transcriptomics data' in 'Nature Computational Science'
Published 'SLIDE: Significant Latent factor Interaction Discovery and Exploration across biological domains' in 'Nature Methods'
NIAID U01 Flu Systems Vaccinology R01 (Role: MPI, PIs: Singh, Alcorn, Das)' funded. This grant focuses on developing advanced vaccination strategies for influenza.

NHLBI R01 Grant for Adenine Nucleotide Translocase in COPD (Role: Co-I)' funded. This grant supports research into the mechanisms of adenine nucleotide translocase in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease.
NIGMS R35 (Role: Co-I, PI: Billiar)' funded. This grant is aimed at investigating molecular mechanisms in biomedical research.
NHLBI R35 (Role: Co-I, PI: A.Ray)' funded. This grant supports cardiovascular research to understand heart diseases.

NCI R01 on hypoxia in T cell differentiation in cancer (Role: Co-I, PI: Billiar)' funded. This grant focuses on the role of hypoxia in the differentiation of T cells within the tumor microenvironment.
Systemic Sclerosis Center for Research and Translation (Role: Co-I)' funded. This grant is for research into systemic sclerosis and developing translation methods.
Swapnil Keshari received and award from NCWIT for mentoring high school student
